system.description:
At 3rd level your reliance on good fortune opens you up to new encounters and the benefits thereof. Choose from the following options:

Consternation

Your reputation as a gambler precedes you, and there are members of any community you travel to that find your gambling ways to be a dangerous influence, particularly on the younger generations. Whenever you use the Gather Information downtime activity you can roll as many of your risk dice each week as you like. Even numbers on your dice reduce the gold cost by their value. Odd numbers increase the gold cost by 1.

Flirtation

Your flair and style set many to swoon. You gain an expertise die on Deception and Persuasion checks against characters who find you attractive.

Tarnation

Whether you had enemies in town before you arrived or not, there are those who find you offensive. Fortunately, they have enemies of their own who delight in tweaking the nose of those they disdain. You and a number of companions equal to your Charisma modifier enjoy a moderate lifestyle while in settlements of 50 or more individuals at no cost.
